data.title: Polycom Acquires Destiny Conferencing
data.meta_description: On January 8, 2009, Polycom acquired information technology company Destiny Conferencing for 48M USD
data.text: Polycom, Inc. is a provider in open standards-based unified communications and collaboration (UC&C) solutions for voice and video collaboration. Polycom solutions are powered by the Polycom RealPresence Platform, comprehensive software infrastructure and rich APIs that interoperate with the broadest set of communication, business, mobile and cloud applications and devices to deliver secure face-to-face video collaboration in any environment. Polycom was formed in 1990 and is based in San Jose, California.
